messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Silly joke, was  Re: bedtimes
messages.msgSnippet: ** ... A wonderuful Danish person having sex with a virgin, what could possibly be wrong with that??
messages.messageBody:
**><< great danes and 18 year old virgins. or vice versa. >>
>18 year old great danes?
>That would put some people off porn forever, no doubt.


A wonderuful Danish person having sex with a virgin, what could possibly
be
wrong with that??
See how tricky those word things can be? LOL!**



That reminds me... (and this is NOT a sexual reference) ... we have a
book called Shrink Lits, with funny poems summarizing and parodying
great works of literature.

The one for Beowulf includes the immortal words "Monster Grendel's
tastes are plainish. Breakfast? Just a couple Danish."

Betsy
